long description: Unlimited Local/STD Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- Unlimited 4G/3G/2G data per day for 4G handsets only (Speed to reduce @80Kbps post 1GB) Applicable to new prepaid acquisitions within 30 calendar days from the day of recharge of First Recharge Offer (STV 342 till 31st March 2017) -- Get 5% of MRP as TT on recharges through My Idea App and Idea Website --

Unlimited I2I Mob -- 3000 Loc/ STD Mins -- 1 GB 4G/3G Data --  Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable  -- Get 5% of MRP as TT on recharges through My Idea App and Idea Website -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
400 Local/National Mobile Mins -- 1 GB 3G DATA. Post 1GB DATA charge at 4p/10KB
